content:
{"name": "ST. PAUL UNITED METHODIST CHURCH", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Open Arms has food available on Monday-Wednesday from 1-3 PM. Some clothing and personal care items/toiletries are also available.
Clients can receive food up to four times a month with Photo ID or twice a month without Photo ID.

- New clients must bring Photo ID for Open Arms food (available twice a month)
- No Photo ID required for USDA food (available twice a month)

https://www.facebook.com/StPaulUMCLargo", "email": "", "url": "https://www.stpaulumc.org/serve/open-arms-ministry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2039 Druid Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Clearwater", "state_province": "FL", "postal_code": "33764", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 27.9565937, "longitude": -82.75271389999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(727) 584-8165", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
